0.text: Innate: Caitlyn's basic attacks generate a stack of Count on-attack, doubled when attacking from  brush. At 6 stacks, or 5 while in brush, Caitlyn's next basic attack consumes all stacks to become a Headshot: it has an  uncancellable windup and deals (60 / 85 / 110% (based on level) + (131.25% +  26.25%) critical strike chance) AD bonus physical damage, increased to (110% + (131.25% +  26.25%) critical strike chance) AD against non-champions.

1.text: Caitlyn may fire more than one Headshot until it hits a target, which consumes all stacks.

2.text: Enemies that step over a  Yordle Snap Trap or are hit by  90 Caliber Net can grant an additional Headshot against them at  1300 range within 1.8 seconds, without consuming stacks. Each method grants only one Headshot at a time.

0.text: Active: Caitlyn fires a piercing shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 50% damage to enemies it passes thereafter.

1.text: Enemies  revealed by  Yordle Snap Trap always take  full damage from Piltover Peacemaker.

0.text: Active: Caitlyn sets a visible  untargetable trap at the target location that grants  sight of the area for 1 second and arms after 1 second, lasting for a duration. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.

1.text: Caitlyn periodically stocks a Yordle Snap Trap charge, up to a maximum amount.

2.text: The next enemy champion that springs the trap is  rooted for 1.5 seconds,  revealed for 3 seconds, takes additional damage from  Headshot, and becomes immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.

0.text: Active: Caitlyn fires a net in the target direction and  recoils 390 units in the opposite direction. The net deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 1 second.

1.text: Caitlyn will not dash backwards if she is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time. She can cast any of her abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Caitlyn locks onto the target enemy champion and  channels for 1 second,  revealing them as well as  revealing herself.

1.text: Ace in the Hole is placed on a 5-second  cooldown if canceled.

2.text: Once Caitlyn completes the channel, she fires a homing bullet toward the target that deals physical damage to the first enemy champion it hits.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 attack damage
+20% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
Unique – Sharpshooter: When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 120 bonus magic damage on-hit. Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range, capped at 150.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ENERGIZED: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.

Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

Active: Caitlyn fires a piercing shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 50% damage to enemies it passes thereafter.

Active: Caitlyn sets a visible  untargetable trap at the target location that grants  sight of the area for 1 second and arms after 1 second, lasting for a duration. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.

The next enemy champion that springs the trap is  rooted for 1.5 seconds,  revealed for 3 seconds, takes additional damage from  Headshot, and becomes immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.
Caitlyn periodically stocks a Yordle Snap Trap charge, up to a maximum amount.
Active: Caitlyn fires a net in the target direction and  recoils 390 units in the opposite direction. The net deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 1 second.
